DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy safety PF-3512676 administer combination gemcitabine/cisplatin chemotherapy first-line treatment patient locally advanced metastatic Non-Small-Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) compare efficacy safety gemcitabine/cisplatin alone .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Gemcitabine/Cisplatin + PF-3512676 v Gemcitabine/Cisplatin Alone Patients With Advanced NSCLC
DOC.detailed_description: PF-3512676 dosing stop 20 June 2007 response DSMC recommendation close trial , cite lack efficacy concern primary reason safety issue ( thrombocytopenia ) also contribute decision . Subjects allow complete standard care treatment/survival follow-up . Data collection complete 25 June 2008 .
